com.discalis.android.maps
Class SampleBalloonItemizedOverlay

java.lang.Object
  
      com.discalis.android.maps.BalloonItemizedOverlay<OverlayItem>
          com.discalis.android.maps.SampleBalloonItemizedOverlay

public class SampleBalloonItemizedOverlay
extends BalloonItemizedOverlay<OverlayItem>

Sample illustrating BalloonItemizedOverlay use. We are using OverlayItem to parametrize BalloonItemizedOverlay, you'll probably want to have some more specific type there, something like MyOwnOverlayItem which extends OverlayItem.

Author:
isaac.salgueiro@discalis.com

Method Detail

createItem

protected OverlayItem createItem(int i)
Returning just one static item.

size

public int size()
Just one single static item...

You're probably backing your OverlayItems in some Collection, so this method will return the size of that Collection.

Please, take thread safeiness in consideration on your implementation. Something like CopyOnWriteArrayList may be very usefull avoiding ConcurrentModificationExceptions...

See Also:
createItem(int);

onBalloonTap

protected boolean onBalloonTap(int index)
Drop a log entry when user taps a balloon

Overrides:
onBalloonTap in class BalloonItemizedOverlay<OverlayItem>
Parameters:
index - OverlayItem which balloon was tapped
Returns:
true, we're not propagating the event.
